intents.tag: i have covid-19, what should i do
patterns: what should i do, i have covid-19
responses: Seek immediate medical attention if you have serious symptoms. Always call before visiting your doctor or health facility.

patterns: what are the symptoms of covid 19
what are some symptoms of covid 19
what are some signs of covid 19
responses: Common symptoms are: Fever, dry cough,tiredness. On average it takes 5 to 6 days from when someone is infected with the virus for symptoms to show, however it can take up to 14 days
